title: Regulatory Document Change Analysis
description: Goose provides a comparative between versions of regulatory documents.
example:
Highlight the differences in these two versions of the Explanatory Statement that accompanies the BNPL Regulations in Australia.

Prior version is here: https://treasury.gov.au/sites/default/files/2025-02/c2025-618982-es.pdf
Final version is here: https://www.legislation.gov.au/F2025L00303/latest/text/explanatory-statement
author: GooseAI Team

variables.name: document_name
variables.description: The name/title of the regulatory document being compared

variables.name: prior_version_url
variables.description: URL to the previous version of the document

variables.name: final_version_url
variables.description: URL to the final/current version of the document
